direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate HTML content from the element, but outerHtml includes the element itself while html only includes its children.
Both methods extract content from the element, but text extracts only the text nodes while outerHtml extracts the full HTML structure.
Both methods extract content from the element, but data extracts data nodes and comments while outerHtml extracts the full HTML structure.
Both methods provide a string representation of the element, but toString is more general and may not always return the full HTML structure.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the output settings to be initialized before generating HTML content.
Ensuring child nodes are available is necessary before generating the outer HTML.
Both methods verify the HTML format and handle similar exceptions related to HTML structure.
